definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
brilliant white snow cover (esp. of distant peaks)
melodies of the elite in the state of Chu 楚國|楚国[Chu3 guo2]/highbrow art and literature

sentences.english: The enemy was advancing. The snow was stained with blood.
sentences.chinese: 首都被迫棄守，敵人步步進逼，鮮血將白雪浸染。

sentences.english: His red clothes stood out clearly against the snow.
sentences.chinese: 他的紅衣服在白雪中格外顯眼。

sentences.english: When I search for him all I see is snow.
sentences.chinese: 我搜尋他，卻只看到茫茫白雪。

sentences.english: A few days later the weather finally cleared, revealing a completely white north face.
sentences.chinese: 數日後，天氣轉好，白雪皚皚的整個北壁一覽無餘。

sentences.english: Snow white tried in vain to please her step-mother.
sentences.chinese: 白雪公主嘗試取悅後母是徒勞的。

sentences.english: They see Cinderella and Snow White.
sentences.chinese: 她們會看到灰姑娘和白雪公主。

sentences.english: The tower is surmounted with snow.
Then the Queen know that Snow-white was dead.
sentences.chinese: 於是，王后知道白雪公主已經死了。

sentences.english: The trees were silvered with snow.
sentences.chinese: 白雪爲樹林披上了銀裝。

sentences.english: What?S. W is nat dead?Hahaha, I got a good idea.
sentences.chinese: 什麼？白雪公主沒死？哈哈哈，我又有一個好主意。

sentences.english: When she saw her, she knew that the bride was Snow White.
sentences.chinese: 皇后看到新娘時，她便知道那是白雪公主。

sentences.english: Here in winter snow, snow mountains everywhere and a piece of white.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的冬天白雪皚皚，到處銀裝素裹，一片潔白。

sentences.english: Because she is so nice, they soon like her.
sentences.chinese: 不外白雪公主人很好，所以他們很快就喜歡她了。

sentences.english: It's at this time of year that I start to pine for the snow-topped mountains.
sentences.chinese: 每年這個時候我就開始嚮往覆蓋着白雪的高山。

sentences.english: Japan's Mount Fuji, covered with snow, stands amidst the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 日本富士山，山峯高聳入雲，山巔白雪皚皚。

sentences.english: I hear His steps on the crusted snow.
sentences.chinese: 在暟暟的白雪裏，我聽見祂的腳聲。

definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
brilliant white snow cover (esp. of distant peaks)
frost forming a pattern on a surface/rime
(of mist, snow, floodwater etc) a vast expanse of whiteness
goose feather snow (idiom)/big heavy snow fall
Daxue or Great Snow, 21st of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st December
to float down/to fall gently (snowflakes, leaves etc)
